remarks: Value of the aleph function at a successor ordinal.  Definition 12(ii) of [Suppes] p. 91.  Here we express the successor aleph in terms of the Hartogs function ~ df-har , which gives the smallest ordinal that strictly dominates its argument (or the supremum of all ordinals that are dominated by the argument).  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 13-Sep-2013.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 15-May-2015.)
statement: alephsuc $p |- ( A e. On -> ( aleph ` suc A ) = ( har ` ( aleph ` A ) ) ) $.
